title: Periodic case: heat-kernel residue equals mean H
statement_md: For periodic binary X with mean H, the heat kernel K(t)=\sum_{n\ge1} X(n) e^{-nt} satisfies \(\lim_{t\to0^+} t K(t) = H\).
assumptions_md: X is periodic; proof uses geometric-series decomposition. This receipt provides a numerical check.
